sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { StudentService } from '../services/student.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-student-list', templateUrl: './student-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./student-list.component.css'] }) export class StudentListComponent implements OnInit { students: any[] = []; constructor(private stdService: StudentService) { } ngOnInit() { this.stdService.getStudents().subscribe((data: any) => { this.students = data; }); console.log("student data : ", students) } }
